item.title: Heal other [508]
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

i made

[CODE] if (p.magicDelay == 0) {
if (ButtonId == 280 && p.skillLvl[6] >= 92) {
if (Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 9075) > 3
&& Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 563) > 3
&& Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 565) > 1) {

                    p.stopMovement(p);
                    p.magicDelay = 7;
                    p.requestAnim(4411, 0);
                    p2.requestGFX(734, 0);
int hitdmg = p.skillLvl[3] / 75;			
p2.updateHP(hitdmg , true);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 9075,
                            Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 9075), 3);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 563,
                            Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 563), 3);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 565,
                            Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 565), 1);

                } else {
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p,
                            "You don't have enough runes to cast this spell.");
                }
            } else {
                p.frames.sendMessage(p,
                        "You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell.");
            }
        } else {
            p.stopMovement(p);
        }[/CODE]

compiler says i have a illegal character error and lose of precision.
here

int hitdmg = p.skillLvl[3] * .75;

any type of help is much appreciated.
when the int hitdmg has a / 75 the lose of precision goes away.

Read full topic
